title: Citibank Partners with Tourism Australia to Invite Global Youth Travelers to Apply for Some of the Best Jobs Down Under
summary: Sydney - Citibank in Australia is partnering with Tourism Australia to support the "Best Jobs in the World," a global competition to find six youth travellers for six-month job opportunities promoting the land down under.
tag-1: Citibank Partners with Tourism Australia to Invite Global Youth Travelers to Apply for Some of the Best Jobs Down Under
tag-2: Sydney – Citibank in Australia is partnering with Tourism Australia to support the "Best Jobs in the World," a global competition to find six youth travellers for six-month job opportunities promoting the land down under.
tag-3: The six "Best Jobs in the World" each come with an attractive salary package worth A$100,000, including living costs. The jobs are an Outback Adventurer in the Northern Territory, Park Ranger in Queensland, Wildlife Caretaker in South Australia, Chief Funster in New South Wales, Lifestyle Photographer in Melbourne and Taste Master in Western Australia.
tag-4: Citibank's contribution consists of an A$1,000 deposit in a Citibank Plus Account for each of 18 finalists, for a charity fundraising challenge to be held in Australia. All proceeds will go to Citibank's nominated charity partner which is yet to be announced.
tag-5: The campaign will target travellers between 18 and 30 years of age with particular focus on international markets where people are eligible for Australian working holiday visas, as well as Australians. This includes the U.K., Ireland, the U.S., Canada, Germany, France, Italy, Sweden, Hong Kong, Taiwan, South Korea and Japan.
tag-6: Linda Duncombe, Director of Digital, Marketing and Customer Experience for Citibank in Australia, said: "We are excited to partner with Tourism Australia on this great initiative. We pride ourselves on the global banking services we provide the world's travellers, and look forward to working with the finalists to set up their bank accounts in Australia. We also welcome the opportunity to support our community with the funds that will be raised from the finalist challenge."
tag-7: Citibank in Australia provides fee-free access to worldwide ATMs and foreign currency accounts through which money can be transferred quickly and easily.
tag-8: Tourism Australia Managing Director Andrew McEvoy said, "We've come up with a competition that represents the very best of our country – our breath-taking landscapes and scenery, our unique nature and wildlife, great food and wine and, of course our huge sense of fun."
